name: perfect park
description:
Race against strangers and friends, only the TOP rocket drifter has the chance to perform a PERFECT PARK.

CONTROLS

  • Turn car - Left stick / WASD
  • Roll car - Right sick / Bumpers / QE
  • Gas - Right trigger / Space
  • Reverse - Left trigger / Shift
  • Brake - ??
  • Honk - Facebuttons / 1234
  • Settings menu - Start button / Escape

TO-DO / KNOWN ISSUES

  • Car customisation.
  • Better  and varied honks.
  • Level editor is ass.
  • Lacking hot tunes, just play your initial d x kickstart my heart remix for now.
  • Stuttering at 60+ fps.
  • Racing ladder, start with easier maps.
  • Collision issues.
